commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
Log in

<.form let={f} for={@conn} action={Routes.user_session_path(@conn, :create)} as={:user}> <%= if @error_message do %>

<%= @error_message %>

<% end %>
<.form_label form={f} field={:email} /> <.text_input form={f} field={:email} placeholder="email" /> <.form_field_error form={f} field={:email} class="mt-1" />
<%= label f, :password %> <%= password_input f, :password, required: true %> <%= label f, :remember_me, "Keep me logged in for 60 days" %> <%= checkbox f, :remember_me %>
<%= submit "Log in" %>

<%= link "Register", to: Routes.user_registration_path(@conn, :new) %> | <%= link "Forgot your password?", to: Routes.user_reset_password_path(@conn, :new) %>
